name: Treadmill Pro 3000
description: High-performance treadmill with customizable running programs and a large LCD display.

name: Adjustable Dumbbells Set
description: Set of adjustable dumbbells with weights ranging from 5 to 50 lbs, ideal for home workouts.

name: Yoga Mat
description: Eco-friendly, non-slip yoga mat, perfect for all types of yoga and floor exercises.

name: Elliptical Trainer
description: Smooth and silent elliptical trainer with multiple resistance levels and built-in heart rate monitor.

name: Resistance Bands Set
description: Versatile set of resistance bands with varying levels of resistance, suitable for all fitness levels.

name: Exercise Bike
description: Compact and quiet exercise bike with adjustable seat and resistance levels.

name: Kettle bell 20 lbs
description: Durable cast-iron kettle bell, ideal for full-body workouts and strength training.

name: Foam Roller
description: High-density foam roller, perfect for muscle recovery and improving flexibility.

name: Rowing Machine
description: Effective full-body workout rowing machine with adjustable resistance and LCD monitor.

name: Jump Rope
description: High-speed jump rope with adjustable length, great for cardio and coordination training.
